segments.text: It's especially cold when the wind is blowing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you wear a scarf ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can wearing one do for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're cold because the wind is blowing into your open collar . It's not because your jacket isn't thick enough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So wearing a scarf helps your body to stay warm inside your jacket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . That's the secret to wearing a thin jacket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , sometimes I can't feel my ears and fingers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll lend you my gloves and earmuffs until you get your own .
segments.speaker: S2
